implementation_output.changes_summary: Created diff_engine.py with compute_diff() function supporting JSON and unified formats using difflib. Implemented compute_json_diff() with SequenceMatcher for structured change regions, compute_unified_diff() for git-diff style output, and check_patch_applicability() helper. Both formats return DiffSummary with line counts. Updated core/__init__.py to export all diff functions. Created comprehensive test suite with 34 test cases covering identical content, empty files, single/multi-line changes, mixed changes, context lines, unified format correctness, summary accuracy, trailing newlines, large files, and edge cases. All tests pass.

results.details: ruff check passed - all checks passed
